constituent: grant, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, easy, sun, day, knot, piglet’s tail
koohiiStory2: Do you want free shells from the government? It´s easy with my new book, "How to Get a Free Grant from the Government!" Call today!
kunYomi: たまわ.る、たま.う、たも.う
words: 賜る(たまわる): to grant, to bestow
